verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: will] join the President when he flies into London for his first trip to Britain , after being mostly absent from her duties as First Lady since her kidney operation last month .

[ARG0: Melania Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: join] [ARG1: the President] [ARGM-TMP: when he flies into London for his first trip to Britain , after being mostly absent from her duties as First Lady since her kidney operation last month] .

Melania Trump will join the President [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG1: he] [V: flies] [ARGM-DIR: into London] [ARGM-PRP: for his first trip to Britain] , [ARGM-TMP: after being mostly absent from her duties as First Lady since her kidney operation last month] .

Melania Trump will join the President when he flies into London for his first trip to Britain , after [V: being] [ARG2: mostly absent from her duties as First Lady] [ARGM-TMP: since her kidney operation last month] .
